markdownRemark.html: The report will document the development of the educational game that will address aspects of cultural management. Through the use of interactive technologies and game-based learning the aim will be to increase awareness of and appreciation for EU culture with special emphasis on how, from the very start of the development of the game, a historian and an archeologist will be involved to make sure that all the details included in the game are historically accurate.
